name: MetronomePro
0:
”Alexa, open Metronome Pro”
”play a beat at Andante for 1 minute”
”play at 40 beats per minute for 30 seconds”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: metronome pro
des:
Metronome Pro is the best metronome for Alexa. We've updated the basic metronome with more interesting functions to enable you to practice music on your terms, without ever leaving your instrument.

We've focused on delivering an amazing experience, including understanding common tempo markings such as Andante or Allegro for you classical music fans, as well as creating "custom sequences" for heavy metal slayers. 

When you purchase custom sequences, you can create automatically have Metronome Pro increase the tempo to practice licks or passages at increasing speeds. Frequently, practicing involves playing a certain passage slowly, then increasing the tempo over time. Custom sequences does this for you without getting up from your chair.

For example, you can play:
80 bpm for 30s
90 bpm for 30s
100 bpm for 30s
120 bpm for 30s
150 bpm for 30s
All in one sequence that you can name. 

So go ahead, get your beat and practice on!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
